computer.description:
Little is known about this system, please help !
From Zahoor Iqbal Awan: I have used this system for 2+ years following configuration: Model System V - 100 Memory 8+8 mb Octart (Serial Ports) Boards x 2 Wyse Mono Terminals/Console 20+100 mb Harddisk (Bulky about 3~4kg) 20mb Tape Drive Large Floppy Drive Front Lock (Power system) Wyse Terminal Keyboard
- Had to boot cromix bootstrap first and then on to AT&T Unix system V earlier releases. - Used Informix for rdbms
computer.graphics: Unknown (optional high resolution card and optional Video Digitizing and imaging)
computer.keyboard: Full stroke keyboard with numeric keypad and function keys
computer.name: System V
